name: Rosarito Inn

reviews.text: We stayed here from August 2nd to August 5th in CDM Room #611. The room was as pictured on the website and clean. The view was great and the balcony made relaxing in the morning extra nice. The loud music from Bombay Bar next door might be a problem for some so be sure to book a room on the other side of the tower if you're a light (or not so light) sleeper. We had earplugs so the music wasn't a problem. This is Rosarito after all and loud, late nights should be expected. Overall the property was clean and the parking was secure and safe. Check-in was a little slow but not horribly so. Would we stay there again? Yes, because the location is awesome, the rooms clean, and the balcony is a must. We might ask for a room opposite the clubs though.
reviews.title: August Weekend

reviews.text: Unfortunately our spring break vacation to Rosarito was a disaster. Reader should keep in mind we are an American family traveling with two kids. We arrived in Rosarito to huge crowds and spent an hour trying to find this “hotel.” The name Rosarito Inn is deceiving. Rosarito Inn is not a hotel, but a condo sub-let service. We ended up in a large unit in the Oceana condos. The condo itself was fine, but it is located right next to an open-air disco that had an all-night rave. We did not sleep a wink. The music continued until the morning. To give you an idea of how loud the music was the pictures in the children’s room vibrated off the walls and we were on the seventh floor and had windows closed!
reviews.title: Nightmare! Easter weekend

reviews.text: I can imagine during a quiet time of year this could be a pleasant stop, but I would advise families to stay in a quieter area. If you are looking for a hotel with any services, this is not a good option.
reviews.title: Right on the sand...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No muss... no fuss... Sign in - sign out, it's that easy. The condo we requested # T-104 has the only Roll in Shower in Rosarito... perfect for those in a wheel chair. The condo was immaculate... contained "everything from pots & pans, washer and dryer, coffee maker, blender, dishes, glasses, utensils...you want for nothing" Secure gated parking... and your condo opens up to and is right on the sand... Lots of attention paid to keeping this place sparkling clean. Although they claim to offer room service, we could not accomplish it... their resturant is a few feet walking distance form the complex... and has good food.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Oceanfront and central to everything. A short walk to downtown restaurants, Pappas and beer, Rosarito beach hotel (restaurants/bar). The location couldn't be better. For $117 a night, an almost 900 sq ft condo on the beach was a great deal. Staff was friendly, always having parking gates open when entering leaving facility.
reviews.title: Vacation Get Away

description: Ocean front 1-4 Bedroom Suites. All amenities.
